title.native: 名探偵コナン 緋色の弾丸

description:
Japan is celebrating the upcoming World Sports Games (WSG), the world's largest sporting event, in Tokyo. The "Japanese Bullet," the world's first vacuum-tube super-conducting linear train, is built with the latest Japanese technology and timed to coincide with the WSG opening ceremonies. The train is set to run from Shin Nagoya Station to Tokyo Station at up to 1,000 kilometers per hour (about 600 miles per hour). However, a bizarre incident occurs during a party held by famous major sponsors, leading to a string of kidnappings of top executives. Conan deduces a possible link to serial abductions in the WSG 15 years earlier in Boston.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Detective Conan Movie 24: The Scarlet Bullet
Meitantei Conan Movie 24: Hiiro no Dangan
Case Closed Movie 24: The Scarlet Bullet
名侦探柯南：绯色的子弹

name.native: ジョディ・スターリング
ジェイムズ・ブラック

node.description:
__Favorite Food:__ Rice with curry

Gosho Aoyama, alternatively known by his real name Yoshimasa Aoyama, is a Japanese mangaka and animator, best known as the creator of Detective Conan (internationally known as Case Closed), Magic Kaito, and YAIBA.

Japanese rock band formed by [Ringo Shiina](https://anilist.co/staff/103213/Ringo-Shiina) after leaving her solo career. The band's debut single "Gunjo Biyori" was released in September 2004, and they ended activities in February 2012. The band reunited and released a new single on January 1st, 2020.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖之)

Son of [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/). Brother of [Keiko Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/).
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上慶子)

Daughter of [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/). Sister of [Yasuyuki Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/144509/).

[Website (FLAT STUDIO)](http://flatstudio.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/loundraw) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=772547) | [Tumblr](http://loundrawblr.tumblr.com)

Illustrator who made his professional debut in his teens with a cover illustration for Gara Nagata's _Hoshi no Nemuru Mizuumi e -Ai wo Sagashi ni-_. He also worked on the covers of various novels, such as Keigo Higashino’s _Koi no Gondola_ and Yoru Sumino’s _Kimi no Suizou wo Tabetai_.

He is also active in other creative areas like music, where he is part of the artist group CHRONICLE. At the end of 2016, he published his first art book ‘Hello, light. ~loundraw art works~’.

In January 2019, he established the animation studio FLAT STUDIO with [Tetsuya Sano](https://anilist.co/staff/126059/Tetsuya-Sano) also joining the studio.

In February of 2021 he launched "PROJECT COMMON", a multimedia project with the theme of "expressing the true loundraw"

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suwacchi)

Michihiko is a producer, planner and supervisor. He is a chief producer at Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.
